title: Mongodb Cert
note: I need to be more proficient with a database to be able to write my backend. I started the mongodb Developer Learning Path and plan on earning a certificate. I chose mongodb because I don't know what my side projects data structures will be ahead of time so I am taking advantage of the flexibility offered by mongodb.

title: .map()
note: Only works on arrays. Creates a new array from an old array. Used to modify or use an array without changing the original array. Behaves like a for loop

title: Getting Log Started
note: I am making a JSON file to simulate a database to map the information over the front end components
